index.hero:
pollinating.space - the ecosystem for pollinating green communities that include several resources to help 
greening and ecological activist and communities to cooperate online in safe and productive environment

ecosystemList.title: WHAT POLLINATING.SPACE ECOSYSTEM INCLUDE:
ecosystemList.0: website pollinating.space - give a overall view about the project
ecosystemList.2: space for storage info (Google space or other spaces to organize info?)

3.title: tool for facilitation and collab online

4.title: IT tools for greening communities:
4.item0: mesto.io help communities to count trees they care about
4.item1: croudforse help communities to systemize their efforts in caring the garden

index.feedback:
We share free access for communities that wish to promote online collaboration to save the greening Infrastructure in their Cities. 
if you want to join and get access for the pollinating IT tool ecosystem - fill the google form (create a questionnaire)

items.title: 30 SEPT - 6 OCTOBER START OF THE PLATFORM
